title: OJ Simpson, NBA All Time Duo, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: OJ Simpson, NBA All Time Duo, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today's show is dedicated to everybody that just got off of house arrest but still can't go nowhere anyway. We all at the same house. The Chief Love Officer answers questions about a momma's boy and more. There was on outage of social media that has been resolved. OJ Simpson gives us his opinion on Tiger King and Steve has something to say about that. Shaq names 8 of the all time best duos in the NBA and it got the whole crew stuck. Sheryl Underwood stops by and talks about what happened in Tampa and gives a friendly reminder about the love between her and Junior. Miss Carla covers the Kardashians in Reality Update. The CDC and WHO have a message about masks. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve wants us to see the abundance that is right in front of us , plus so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
